root: ^“Welcome! Have you also come to see our new robot, which has improved tremendously compared to the previous one?”

s: ^I was just at the showcase of the new artificial arm and I was told to come have a look at the Cybernetics and “I Love Robots” store.

flyer: ^“You have come at the perfect time! Here, take this, I’m sure you’ll love it. Don’t wait too long or someone else will buy him.”
